author: Doug Bostrom
content: I was wondering the same thing, Jack. Not a potential customer of cruise ships normally but this one could be the first exception.

author: Jack Brown
content:
It would be great if a reader who has sailed aboard MV Astoria in recent years could offer some info on her current state. Comfortable and vintage? Down at the heels shabby? Barely there? Pack a bilge pump and your own PFD?

I missed a chance to sail on a classic ship (really regret missing QE2). The modern cruise ship is an overstuffed steel box of no character, imho. A chance to experience a classic would be great — if bed bugs not included.

author: Doug Bostrom
content:
From when big ships had sheer because folks were willing to spend a little on beauty– just because.

Lovely lines there.
